OS/2, usWeightClass

ID 2 is 'Bold Italic'

Everything is good.

Pass

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Bold Italic (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-BoldItalic.ttf)

name, Bold Italic

MS NID 2

MS ID 2 should be 'Bold Italic' and OS2.fsSelection.bold = True and head.macStyle.bold = True and OS2.fsSelection.regular = False.

ID 2 is 'Bold Italic'
OS2.fsSelection.bold is 'True'
head.macStyle.bold is 'True'
OS2.fsSelection.regular is 'False'

name, Italic

OS2.fsSelection.bold is 'True'
head.macStyle.bold is 'True'

This is a TrueType font. This test is only for CFF.

FEFF

ZERO WIDTH NO-BREAK SPACE: Missing FEFF in cmap table.

Required for Monotype library. Please add unicode FEFF. Custom work refer to spec.

Pass

Soft hyphen is often used in web and in professional print publishing software like Adobe InDesign.

hmtx

Index 4 and 99

Advance width of nonbreakingspace (uni00A0) should match the space (uni0020) width.

Advance width nonbreakingspace (uni00A0) 532 ≠ space (uni0020) 425.
If the width matches the original font, it does not need to be changed.

Can not check, because no uni2008 in this font.

Nodes Close to Zones (CFF)

Nodes Close to Zones (CFF)

Info

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Light Regular (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-Light.ttf)

CFF

Alignment Zones

Check if nodes are close to a zone, but not in or touching it.

This is a TTF, but this test is only for CFF fonts.

Info

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Light Italic (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-LightItalic.ttf)

CFF

Alignment Zones

Check if nodes are close to a zone, but not in or touching it.

This is a TTF, but this test is only for CFF fonts.

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Extra Bold Italic (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-ExtraBoldItalic.ttf)

CFF

Alignment Zones

This is a TTF, but this test is only for CFF fonts.

Should be Composite (only .ttf)

Should be Composite (only .ttf)

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Light Regular (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-Light.ttf)

glyf

-/-

Glyphs (LATIN) which chould be made from components (in many cases).
Please investigate and approve if correct.

First Four Characters

Pass

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Light Regular (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-Light.ttf)

post

Index 0

PostScript name should be ".notdef".

OK: Index 0 = ".notdef".

Pass

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Light Regular (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-Light.ttf)

hmtx

Index 0

'.notdef' advance width should not be 0.

OK: '.notdef' advance width is 532.

Pass

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Light Regular (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-Light.ttf)

post

Index 1

PostScript name should be one of the names:
".null"
"null"
"NULL".

OK: Index 1 = ".null".

Pass

glyf

Index 1

'.null' shoiuld have no contours.

'.null' has 0 contours.

Pass

hmtx

Index 1

'.null' should have an advance width of 0.

OK: '.null' has an advance width of 0.

Pass

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Light Regular (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-Light.ttf)

post

Index 2

"nonmarkingreturn"
"CR".

OK: Index 2 = "nonmarkingreturn".

Pass

glyf

'nonmarkingreturn' should have no contours.

OK: 'nonmarkingreturn' has 0 contours.

Error

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Light Regular (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-Light.ttf)

post

Index 3

PostScript name should be "space"

Index 3 = "CR". Check that character is the correct glyph.

Pass

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Light Italic (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-LightItalic.ttf)

glyf

Index 1

'.null' shoiuld have no contours.

'.null' has 0 contours.

Pass

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Light Italic (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-LightItalic.ttf)

hmtx

Index 1

'.null' should have an advance width of 0.

OK: '.null' has an advance width of 0.

Pass

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Light Italic (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-LightItalic.ttf)

post

Index 2

PostScript name should be one of the names:
"nonmarkingreturn"
"CR".

OK: Index 2 = "nonmarkingreturn".

Pass

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Light Italic (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-LightItalic.ttf)

glyf

Index 2

'nonmarkingreturn' should have no contours.

OK: 'nonmarkingreturn' has 0 contours.

Error

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Light Italic (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-LightItalic.ttf)

hmtx

Index 2

Advance width of 'nonmarkingreturn' should match the space width.

'nonmarkingreturn' advance width '940' does not match the space width '346'.
If the width matches the original font's index 2 width, it does not need to be changed.

Pass

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Light Italic (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-LightItalic.ttf)

post

Index 3

PostScript name should be "space"

OK: Index 3 = "space".

Pass

'space' should have no contours.

OK: 'space' has 0 contours.

OS/2

italic flag

OK: They are the same.'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag is False and 'head' macStyle italic flag is False.

table version 3.

'OS/2' table version should be 4.

'OS/2' table version is: 3. Verify that this is the version required.

Pass

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Extra Bold Italic (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-ExtraBoldItalic.ttf)

OS/2

italic flag

'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag should match the 'head' macStyle italic flag. They should be the same.

OK: They are the same.'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag is True and 'head' macStyle italic flag is True.

Pass

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Extra Bold Italic (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-ExtraBoldItalic.ttf)

OS/2

usBreakChar

'OS/2' usBreakChar should be 0x0020.

OK: 'OS/2' usBreakChar is 0x0020.

Pass

usDefaultChar

OK: 'OS/2' usDefaultChar is 0x0000.

Pass

Error

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Extra Bold Italic (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-ExtraBoldItalic.ttf)

OS/2

Embedding Level

For library fonts embedding level should be 'Preview & Print Embedding'.

Embedding Level is 'Embedding Level = Installable Embedding'. If custom font please check against job spec.

Info

no subsetting flag: False
bitmap embedding only flag: False

STAT table

STAT table

Info

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Light Regular (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-Light.ttf)

STAT

static font

Variable font must have a STAT table.

No check of STAT table for static fonts included, yet. Static fonts do not need to have a STAT table. It is only recommended by Microsoft, not required.
More infos here:
https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/typography/opentype/spec/stat

Info

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Light Italic (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-LightItalic.ttf)

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Light Regular (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-Light.ttf)

name

Mac NID 0 (1, 0, 0, 0)

Mac NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
Mac NID 0 is 'Digitized data copyright (c) 2011, Google Corporation. Copyright (c) 2012, 2013 Yanek Iontef (yanek@netvision.net.il)'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Error

NID 1 length is '32' but shouldn't be longer then 31 characters.
'Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Light'

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Light Regular (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-Light.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '29' but shouldn't be longer then 27 characters.
'OpenSansHebrewCondensed-Light'

Pass

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Light Regular (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-Light.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'OpenSansHebrewCondensed-Light', Everything looks good.

Pass

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Light Regular (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-Light.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'OpenSansHebrewCondensed-Light', Everything looks good.

Pass

name

Mac NID 7

Test Trademark

Current trademark is:
'Open Sans is a trademark of Google and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'
but what do think about this
'Open Sans is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

(This is automatically generated and might be wrong. Must be confirmed by legal)

name

Mac NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

Mac NID 8 is 'Ascender Corporation, Yanek Iontef', but should be one of these: 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited', 'Monotype GmbH', 'MyFonts Inc.', 'MyFonts Inc', 'Fontsmith Ltd.', 'Fontsmith Ltd'.

Error

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Light Regular (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-Light.ttf)

name

Mac NID 11

Mac NID 11, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 11 is http://www.ascendercorp.com/ http://www.fontef.com, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Light Regular (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-Light.ttf)

name

Mac NID 12

Mac NID 12, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 12 is http://www.ascendercorp.com/typedesigners.html, Yanek Iontef, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Light Regular (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-Light.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8/13

License text

Cannot check license text because of unkown entity 'Ascender Corporation, Yanek Iontef' (NID8). Please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0
, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Light Regular (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-Light.ttf)

name

Mac NID 14

Mac NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Light Regular (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-Light.ttf)

name

Mac NID 16/17

Mac NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Open Sans Hebrew Condensed' + 'Space' + NID 17 'Light' = NID 1 'Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Light'.

Pass

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Light Regular (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-Light.ttf)

name

MS NID 0 (3, 1, 1033, 0)

MS NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
MS NID 0 is 'Digitized data copyright (c) 2011, Google Corporation. Copyright (c) 2012, 2013 Yanek Iontef (yanek@netvision.net.il)'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Error

NID 1 length is '32' but shouldn't be longer then 31 characters.
'Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Light'

name/head

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Light Regular (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-Light.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '29' but shouldn't be longer then 27 characters.
'OpenSansHebrewCondensed-Light'

Pass

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Light Regular (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-Light.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'OpenSansHebrewCondensed-Light', Everything looks good.

Pass

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Light Regular (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-Light.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'OpenSansHebrewCondensed-Light', Everything looks good.

Pass

but what do think about this
'Open Sans is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. Family Name is present.

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Light Italic (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-LightItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 0 (1, 0, 0, 0)

Mac NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
Mac NID 0 is 'Digitized data copyright (c) 2011, Google Corporation. Copyright (c) 2012, 2013 Yanek Iontef (yanek@netvision.net.il)'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Error

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Light Italic (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-LightItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Mac NID 1, Family Name length shouldn't be longer then 31.

NID 1 length is '32' but shouldn't be longer then 31 characters.
'Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Light'

Pass

name/head

Mac NID 5

Error

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Light Italic (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-LightItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '35' but shouldn't be longer then 27 characters.
'OpenSansHebrewCondensedLight-Italic'

Pass

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Light Italic (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-LightItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'OpenSansHebrewCondensedLight-Italic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Light Italic (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-LightItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'OpenSansHebrewCondensedLight-Italic', Everything looks good.

Pass

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Light Italic (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-LightItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 7

Test Trademark

Current trademark is:
'Open Sans is a trademark of Google and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'
but what do think about this
'Open Sans is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

(This is automatically generated and might be wrong. Must be confirmed by legal)

Error

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Light Italic (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-LightItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

Mac NID 8 is 'Ascender Corporation, Yanek Iontef', but should be one of these: 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited', 'Monotype GmbH', 'MyFonts Inc.', 'MyFonts Inc', 'Fontsmith Ltd.', 'Fontsmith Ltd'.

Error

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Light Italic (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-LightItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 11

Mac NID 11, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 11 is http://www.ascendercorp.com/ http://www.fontef.com, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Light Italic (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-LightItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 12

Mac NID 12, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 12 is http://www.ascendercorp.com/typedesigners.html, Yanek Iontef, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Light Italic (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-LightItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8/13

License text

Cannot check license text because of unkown entity 'Ascender Corporation, Yanek Iontef' (NID8). Please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0
, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Light Italic (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-LightItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 14

Mac NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Light Italic (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-LightItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 16/17

Mac NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Open Sans Hebrew Condensed' + 'Space' + NID 17 'Light Italic' = NID 1 'Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Light' + 'Space' + NID 2 'Italic'.

Pass

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Light Italic (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-LightItalic.ttf)

Cannot check license text because of unkown entity 'Ascender Corporation, Yanek Iontef' (NID8). Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0
, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Light Italic (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-LightItalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Light Italic (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-LightItalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Pass

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Light Italic (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-LightItalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Open Sans Hebrew Condensed' + 'Space' + NID 17 'Light Italic' = NID 1 'Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Light' + 'Space' + NID 2 'Italic'.

Pass

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Light Italic (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-LightItalic.ttf)

name

Reserved word used in Typographic Family Name NID16 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 16 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Regular (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-Regular.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '31' but shouldn't be longer then 27 characters.
'OpenSansHebrewCondensed-Regular'

Pass

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Regular (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-Regular.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'OpenSansHebrewCondensed-Regular', Everything looks good.

Pass

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Regular (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-Regular.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'OpenSansHebrewCondensed-Regular', Everything looks good.

Pass

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Regular (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-Regular.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '31' but shouldn't be longer then 27 characters.
'OpenSansHebrewCondensed-Regular'

Pass

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Regular (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-Regular.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'OpenSansHebrewCondensed-Regular', Everything looks good.

Pass

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Regular (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-Regular.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'OpenSansHebrewCondensed-Regular', Everything looks good.

Pass

name

Mac NID 0 (1, 0, 0, 0)

Mac NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
Mac NID 0 is 'Digitized data copyright (c) 2011, Google Corporation. Copyright (c) 2012, 2013 Yanek Iontef (yanek@netvision.net.il)'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Italic (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-Italic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 7

Test Trademark

Current trademark is:
'Open Sans is a trademark of Google and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'
but what do think about this
'Open Sans is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

(This is automatically generated and might be wrong. Must be confirmed by legal)

Error

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Italic (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-Italic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

Mac NID 8 is 'Ascender Corporation, Yanek Iontef', but should be one of these: 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited', 'Monotype GmbH', 'MyFonts Inc.', 'MyFonts Inc', 'Fontsmith Ltd.', 'Fontsmith Ltd'.

Error

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Italic (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-Italic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 11

Mac NID 11, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 11 is http://www.ascendercorp.com/ http://www.fontef.com, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Italic (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-Italic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 12

Mac NID 12, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 12 is http://www.ascendercorp.com/typedesigners.html, Yanek Iontef, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Italic (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-Italic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8/13

License text

Cannot check license text because of unkown entity 'Ascender Corporation, Yanek Iontef' (NID8). Please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0
, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Italic (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-Italic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 14

Mac NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Italic (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-Italic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 16/17

Mac NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Open Sans Hebrew Condensed' + 'Space' + NID 17 'Italic' = NID 1 'Open Sans Hebrew Condensed' + 'Space' + NID 2 'Italic'.

Pass

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Italic (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-Italic.ttf)

name

MS NID 0 (3, 1, 1033, 0)

MS NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
MS NID 0 is 'Digitized data copyright (c) 2011, Google Corporation. Copyright (c) 2012, 2013 Yanek Iontef (yanek@netvision.net.il)'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Italic (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-Italic.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

'OpenSansHebrewCondensed-Italic'

Pass

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Italic (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-Italic.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'OpenSansHebrewCondensed-Italic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Italic (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-Italic.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'OpenSansHebrewCondensed-Italic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Italic (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-Italic.ttf)

name

MS NID 7

Test Trademark

Current trademark is:
'Open Sans is a trademark of Google and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'
but what do think about this
'Open Sans is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

(This is automatically generated and might be wrong. Must be confirmed by legal)

Error

name

This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. name

Mac NID 0 (1, 0, 0, 0)

Mac NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
Mac NID 0 is 'Digitized data copyright (c) 2011, Google Corporation. Copyright (c) 2012, 2013 Yanek Iontef (yanek@netvision.net.il)'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Bold (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '28' but shouldn't be longer then 27 characters.
'OpenSansHebrewCondensed-Bold'

Pass

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Bold (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'OpenSansHebrewCondensed-Bold', Everything looks good.

Pass

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'OpenSansHebrewCondensed-Bold', Everything looks good.

Pass

but what do think about this

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Bold (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

Error

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Bold (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8/13

License text

Cannot check license text because of unkown entity 'Ascender Corporation, Yanek Iontef' (NID8). Please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0
, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Bold (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 14

Mac NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Bold (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 16/17

Mac NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Open Sans Hebrew Condensed' + 'Space' + NID 17 'Bold' = NID 1 'Open Sans Hebrew Condensed' + 'Space' + NID 2 'Bold'.

Pass

This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. name

Pass

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Bold (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-Bold.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Open Sans Hebrew Condensed' + 'Space' + NID 17 'Bold' = NID 1 'Open Sans Hebrew Condensed' + 'Space' + NID 2 'Bold'.

Pass

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Bold (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-Bold.ttf)

name

MS NID 16

Reserved word used in Typographic Family Name NID16 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 16 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Pass

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Bold (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-Bold.ttf)

name

MS NID 16

Reserved word used in Typographic Family Name NID16 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 16 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Roman'

Pass

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Bold (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-Bold.ttf)

name

MS NID 16

Reserved word used in Typographic Family Name NID16 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 16 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Regular, Bold, Italic, Extra, Light, Black, Thin, Wide, Ultra'

Pass

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Bold (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-Bold.ttf)

name

MS NID 16

Check Width Names Typographic Family Name NID16

The width name should be before weight name. NID 16 is correct: 'Open Sans Hebrew Condensed'

Pass

name

NID 17 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Pass

name

MS NID 17

Should be camel case Typographic Subfamily Name NID17

NID 17: OK. No camel case required.

Pass

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Bold (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-Bold.ttf)

name

MS NID 17

Check style extentions Typographic Subfamily Name NID17

NID 17 does not contain any of the following beginnings: 'Sm, Xtra, X, Extra, Semi, Ultra, Dm, Demi, Ex'

Pass

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Bold (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 0

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'Digitized data copyright (c) 2011, Google Corporation. Copyright (c) 2012, 2013 Yanek Iontef (yanek@netvision.net.il)'
MS is: 'Digitized data copyright (c) 2011, Google Corporation. Copyright (c) 2012, 2013 Yanek Iontef (yanek@netvision.net.il)'

Pass

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Bold Italic (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-BoldItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 0 (1, 0, 0, 0)

Mac NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
Mac NID 0 is 'Digitized data copyright (c) 2011, Google Corporation. Copyright (c) 2012, 2013 Yanek Iontef (yanek@netvision.net.il)'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

'Open Sans Hebrew Condensed'

'Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Bold Italic'

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Bold Italic (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-BoldItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 4

Mac NID 4 = NID 1 and NID 2.

NID 4 'Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Bold Italic' = NID 1 'Open Sans Hebrew Condensed' + 'space' + NID 2 'Bold Italic'

name/head

Mac NID 5

Error

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Bold Italic (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-BoldItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '34' but shouldn't be longer then 27 characters.
'OpenSansHebrewCondensed-BoldItalic'

Pass

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Bold Italic (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-BoldItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'OpenSansHebrewCondensed-BoldItalic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Bold Italic (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-BoldItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'OpenSansHebrewCondensed-BoldItalic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Bold Italic (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-BoldItalic.ttf)

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Bold Italic (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-BoldItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 7

Test Trademark

Current trademark is:
'Open Sans is a trademark of Google and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'
but what do think about this
'Open Sans is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

(This is automatically generated and might be wrong. Must be confirmed by legal)

Error

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Bold Italic (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-BoldItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

Mac NID 8 is 'Ascender Corporation, Yanek Iontef', but should be one of these: 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited', 'Monotype GmbH', 'MyFonts Inc.', 'MyFonts Inc', 'Fontsmith Ltd.', 'Fontsmith Ltd'.

Error

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Bold Italic (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-BoldItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 11

Mac NID 11, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 11 is http://www.ascendercorp.com/ http://www.fontef.com, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Bold Italic (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-BoldItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 12

Mac NID 12, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 12 is http://www.ascendercorp.com/typedesigners.html, Yanek Iontef, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Bold Italic (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-BoldItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8/13

License text

Cannot check license text because of unkown entity 'Ascender Corporation, Yanek Iontef' (NID8). Please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0
, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Bold Italic (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-BoldItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 14

Mac NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Bold Italic (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-BoldItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 16/17

Mac NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Open Sans Hebrew Condensed' + 'Space' + NID 17 'Bold Italic' = NID 1 'Open Sans Hebrew Condensed' + 'Space' + NID 2 'Bold Italic'.

Pass

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Bold Italic (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-BoldItalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 0 (3, 1, 1033, 0)

MS NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
MS NID 0 is 'Digitized data copyright (c) 2011, Google Corporation. Copyright (c) 2012, 2013 Yanek Iontef (yanek@netvision.net.il)'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Bold Italic (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-BoldItalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'OpenSansHebrewCondensed-BoldItalic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Bold Italic (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-BoldItalic.ttf)

'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'OpenSansHebrewCondensed-BoldItalic', Everything looks good.

Pass

name

Test Trademark

Current trademark is:
'Open Sans is a trademark of Google and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'
but what do think about this
'Open Sans is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

(This is automatically generated and might be wrong. Must be confirmed by legal)

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Bold Italic (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-BoldItalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

MS NID 8 is 'Ascender Corporation, Yanek Iontef', but should be one of these: 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited', 'Monotype GmbH', 'MyFonts Inc.', 'MyFonts Inc', 'Fontsmith Ltd.', 'Fontsmith Ltd'.

Error

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Bold Italic (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-BoldItalic.ttf)

name

NID 11 is http://www.ascendercorp.com/ http://www.fontef.com, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Bold Italic (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-BoldItalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text

Cannot check license text because of unkown entity 'Ascender Corporation, Yanek Iontef' (NID8). Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0
, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Family Name is present.

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Extra Bold Regular (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-ExtraBold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 0 (1, 0, 0, 0)

Mac NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
Mac NID 0 is 'Digitized data copyright (c) 2011, Google Corporation. Copyright (c) 2012, 2013 Yanek Iontef (yanek@netvision.net.il)'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Error

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Extra Bold Regular (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-ExtraBold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Mac NID 1, Family Name length shouldn't be longer then 31.

NID 1 length is '37' but shouldn't be longer then 31 characters.
'Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Extra Bold'

Warning

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Extra Bold Regular (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-ExtraBold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Reserved word 'Bold' used in Family Name NID1 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications. Style linking and/or font embedding for MS Word might not work.

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Extra Bold

Warning

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Extra Bold Regular (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-ExtraBold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

'Bold' at the end of NID 1 causes cross platfrom issues.

It looks like you want to have a 'stand-alone'-font without any style linking, because NID 2 is 'Regular' and NID 1 has the word 'Bold' at the end 'Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Extra Bold'.
This cause issues in PowerPoint, when you create a PowerPoint presentation on your Mac and you want to open it on a Windows machine. The font might be displayed twice in the font selection menu of MS PowerPoint for Windows + cross platform compatiblity does not work. You may want to consider to replace 'Bold' by 'Bd'. It should work then. (Customer A&E May 2019)

Pass

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Extra Bold Regular (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-ExtraBold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Reserved word used in Family Name NID1 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 1 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Regular, Bold, Roman'

Pass

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Extra Bold Regular (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-ExtraBold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Reserved word used in Family Name NID1 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 1 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Pass

Reserved word used in Family Name NID1 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Extra Bold Regular (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-ExtraBold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Reserved word used in Family Name NID1 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 1 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Regular, Bold, Italic, Extra, Light, Black, Thin, Wide, Ultra'

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Extra Bold Regular (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-ExtraBold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Should be camel case Family Name NID1

NID 1: OK. No camel case required.

Pass

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Extra Bold Regular (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-ExtraBold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Check style extentions Family Name NID1

NID 1 does not contain any of the following beginnings: 'Sm, Xtra, X, Extra, Semi, Ultra, Dm, Demi, Ex'

Pass

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Extra Bold Regular (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-ExtraBold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Check Width Names Family Name NID1

The width name should be before weight name. NID 1 is correct: 'Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Extra Bold'

name/head

Mac NID 5

name table version should match head table fontRevision.

OK: name table version entry 'Version 2.001;PS 002.001;hotconv 1.0.70;makeotf.lib2.5.58329' does match fontRevision 'Version 2.001'.

Error

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Extra Bold Regular (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-ExtraBold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '33' but shouldn't be longer then 27 characters.
'OpenSansHebrewCondensed-ExtraBold'

Pass

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Extra Bold Regular (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-ExtraBold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'OpenSansHebrewCondensed-ExtraBold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Extra Bold Regular (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-ExtraBold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'OpenSansHebrewCondensed-ExtraBold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Extra Bold Regular (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-ExtraBold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Reserved word used in PostScript Name NID6 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

NID 6 contains correct campel case: 'ExtraBold, OpenSansHebrewCondensed'

Error

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Extra Bold Regular (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-ExtraBold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 7

Test Trademark

Current trademark is:
'Open Sans is a trademark of Google and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'
but what do think about this
'Open Sans is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

(This is automatically generated and might be wrong. Must be confirmed by legal)

Error

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Extra Bold Regular (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-ExtraBold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

Mac NID 8 is 'Ascender Corporation, Yanek Iontef', but should be one of these: 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited', 'Monotype GmbH', 'MyFonts Inc.', 'MyFonts Inc', 'Fontsmith Ltd.', 'Fontsmith Ltd'.

Error

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Extra Bold Regular (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-ExtraBold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 11

Mac NID 11, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 11 is http://www.ascendercorp.com/ http://www.fontef.com, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Extra Bold Regular (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-ExtraBold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 12

Mac NID 12, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 12 is http://www.ascendercorp.com/typedesigners.html, Yanek Iontef, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Extra Bold Regular (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-ExtraBold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8/13

License text

Cannot check license text because of unkown entity 'Ascender Corporation, Yanek Iontef' (NID8). Please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0
, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Extra Bold Regular (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-ExtraBold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 14

Mac NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Extra Bold Regular (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-ExtraBold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 16/17

Mac NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Open Sans Hebrew Condensed' + 'Space' + NID 17 'Extra Bold' = NID 1 'Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Extra Bold'.

Pass

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Extra Bold Regular (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-ExtraBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 1

'Bold' at the end of NID 1 causes cross platfrom issues.

It looks like you want to have a 'stand-alone'-font without any style linking, because NID 2 is 'Regular' and NID 1 has the word 'Bold' at the end 'Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Extra Bold'.
This cause issues in PowerPoint, when you create a PowerPoint presentation on your Mac and you want to open it on a Windows machine. The font might be displayed twice in the font selection menu of MS PowerPoint for Windows + cross platform compatiblity does not work. You may want to consider to replace 'Bold' by 'Bd'. It should work then. (Customer A&E May 2019)

Test Trademark

Current trademark is:
'Open Sans is a trademark of Google and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'
but what do think about this
'Open Sans is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

(This is automatically generated and might be wrong. Must be confirmed by legal)

Error

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Extra Bold Regular (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-ExtraBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

MS NID 8 is 'Ascender Corporation, Yanek Iontef', but should be one of these: 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited', 'Monotype GmbH', 'MyFonts Inc.', 'MyFonts Inc', 'Fontsmith Ltd.', 'Fontsmith Ltd'.

Error

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Extra Bold Regular (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-ExtraBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 11

MS NID 11, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 11 is http://www.ascendercorp.com/ http://www.fontef.com, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Extra Bold Regular (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-ExtraBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 12

MS NID 12, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 12 is http://www.ascendercorp.com/typedesigners.html, Yanek Iontef, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Extra Bold Regular (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-ExtraBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text

Cannot check license text because of unkown entity 'Ascender Corporation, Yanek Iontef' (NID8). Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0
, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Extra Bold Regular (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-ExtraBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Extra Bold Regular (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-ExtraBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Pass

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Extra Bold Regular (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-ExtraBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Open Sans Hebrew Condensed' + 'Space' + NID 17 'Extra Bold' = NID 1 'Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Extra Bold'.

Pass

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Extra Bold Regular (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-ExtraBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 16

Reserved word used in Typographic Family Name NID16 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 16 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Pass

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Extra Bold Italic (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-ExtraBoldItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 0 (1, 0, 0, 0)

Mac NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
Mac NID 0 is 'Digitized data copyright (c) 2011, Google Corporation. Copyright (c) 2012, 2013 Yanek Iontef (yanek@netvision.net.il)'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Error

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Extra Bold Italic (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-ExtraBoldItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Mac NID 1, Family Name length shouldn't be longer then 31.

NID 1 length is '37' but shouldn't be longer then 31 characters.
'Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Extra Bold'

Warning

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Extra Bold Italic (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-ExtraBoldItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 4

Mac NID 4, Full Name length shouldn't be longer than 31, otherwise it does not work in MS Word 2011/Mac.

NID 4 length is '44' but shouldn't be longer than 31 characters.
'Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Extra Bold Italic'

Pass

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Extra Bold Italic (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-ExtraBoldItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 4

Mac NID 4 = NID 1 and NID 2.

NID 4 'Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Extra Bold Italic' = NID 1 'Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Extra Bold' + 'space' + NID 2 'Italic'

Pass

name/head

Mac NID 5

name table version should match head table fontRevision.

Error

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Extra Bold Italic (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-ExtraBoldItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '39' but shouldn't be longer then 27 characters.
'OpenSansHebrewCondensedExtraBold-Italic'

Pass

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Extra Bold Italic (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-ExtraBoldItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'OpenSansHebrewCondensedExtraBold-Italic', Everything looks good.

Pass

'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'OpenSansHebrewCondensedExtraBold-Italic', Everything looks good.

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Extra Bold Italic (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-ExtraBoldItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8/13

License text

Cannot check license text because of unkown entity 'Ascender Corporation, Yanek Iontef' (NID8). Please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0
, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Extra Bold Italic (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-ExtraBoldItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 14

Mac NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Extra Bold Italic (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-ExtraBoldItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 16/17

Mac NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Open Sans Hebrew Condensed' + 'Space' + NID 17 'Extra Bold Italic' = NID 1 'Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Extra Bold' + 'Space' + NID 2 'Italic'.

Pass

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Extra Bold Italic (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-ExtraBoldItalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 0 (3, 1, 1033, 0)

MS NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
MS NID 0 is 'Digitized data copyright (c) 2011, Google Corporation. Copyright (c) 2012, 2013 Yanek Iontef (yanek@netvision.net.il)'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Error

'Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Extra Bold'

This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Extra Bold Italic (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-ExtraBoldItalic.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 17

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'Extra Bold Italic'
MS is: 'Extra Bold Italic'

Underline Position and Thickness

Pass

post

underline position and thickness

underlinePosition should be a negative and underlineThickness not 0 or negative.

underlinePosition is '-75'.
underlineThicknes is '50'.

Kerning (kern Table and GPOS Kerning)

Kerning (kern Table and GPOS Kerning)

Error

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Light Regular (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-Light.ttf)

GPOS

kern

Simple check if kern feature in GPOS table.

GPOS table does not have kerning feature. Please investigate if this meets requirements.

Info

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Light Regular (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-Light.ttf)

kern

-/-

Check if 'kern' table in font.

Font has no 'kern' table. Please verify if font requires kern table or if only GPOS kerning should be in font.

Pass

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Light Italic (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-LightItalic.ttf)

GPOS

kern

Simple check if kern feature in GPOS table.

The font has GPOS kerning.

Info

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Light Italic (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-LightItalic.ttf)

kern

-/-

Check if 'kern' table in font.

Font has no 'kern' table. Please verify if font requires kern table or if only GPOS kerning should be in font.

Info

kern/GPOS

kern

'kern' table and 'GPOS' kerning.

Font has GPOS kerning and no 'kern' table.
Verify with the spec or PM what is required.

Vertical Metrics

Vertical Metrics

Pass

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Light Regular (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-Light.ttf)

OS/2 and head

sTypeAsc/Desc and unitsPerEm

The result of sTypoAscender – sTypoDescender should match or exceed the unitsPerEm value.

The result of sTypoAscender – sTypoDescender (2059) match or exceed the unitsPerEm value (2048).

Info

gasp Table

gasp Table

Pass

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Light Regular (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-Light.ttf)

gasp

Version

gasp table verison should be 1.

Verison = 1

Info

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Light Regular (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-Light.ttf)

gasp

Default

Pull gasp table Default.

Grid-fit = True, Do gray = True, Symmetric grid-fit = True, Symmetric smoothing = True

Pass

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Light Regular (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-Light.ttf)

gasp

Default

Check gasp table Default.

gasp table default is:
Grid-fit = True, Do gray = True, Symmetric grid-fit = True, Symmetric smoothing = True
and should be:
Grid-fit = True, Do gray = True, Symmetric grid-fit = True, Symmetric smoothing = True

Pass

PostScript names

PostScript names

Pass

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Light Regular (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-Light.ttf)

post

PostScript names

Postscript names should not be longer then 29 characters. May cause issues in PDF.

Every PostScript name is fine.

Pass

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Light Italic (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-LightItalic.ttf)

post

PostScript names

Postscript names should not be longer then 29 characters. May cause issues in PDF.

Every PostScript name is fine.

Pass

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Regular (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-Regular.ttf)

post

PostScript names

Postscript names should not be longer then 29 characters. May cause issues in PDF.

Every PostScript name is fine.

Pass

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Italic (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-Italic.ttf)

post

PostScript names

Postscript names should not be longer then 29 characters. May cause issues in PDF.

Every PostScript name is fine.

Pass

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Bold (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-Bold.ttf)

post

PostScript names

Postscript names should not be longer then 29 characters. May cause issues in PDF.

Every PostScript name is fine.

Pass

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Bold Italic (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-BoldItalic.ttf)

post

PostScript names

Postscript names should not be longer then 29 characters. May cause issues in PDF.

Every PostScript name is fine.

Pass

Open Sans Hebrew Condensed Extra Bold Regular (OpenSansHebrewCondensed-ExtraBold.ttf)

post

PostScript names

Postscript names should not be longer then 29 characters. May cause issues in PDF.

Every PostScript name is fine.

PostScript names

Postscript names should not be longer then 29 characters. May cause issues in PDF.

Every PostScript name is fine.
